title: Infield play at 1st and 3rd
creator_credit: American and National Leagues of Professional Baseball Clubs
brief_description: Instructional film for intending infield players at first and third base. Some very fine slow-motion footage reveals that wealth of delicate grace otherwise latent in baseball’s gymnastic protocols.
